Main moduleÂ¶

The main module contains the core classes of the library:

  • The Group class stores a dataset from a single XAFS scan.

  • The Collection class is stores and operate on multiple groups.

  • The Dataset class stores a dataset from analysis of XAFS spectra.

  • The Report class provides a simple framework to print and manipulate dataset information.
